topic: NK nuclear test readiness and likelihood
summary: NK technically ready at Punggye-ri since 2022 but no satellite evidence of imminent test; 8+ year gap since last test; diplomatic window may deter
content:
Key findings for NK nuclear test before May 1, 2026:
- Last test: Sept 2017 (8+ years ago)
- Tunnel No. 3 at Punggye-ri ready since ~2022
- Nov 2025 satellite: no signs of imminent test
- NK focused on missile tests (cruise, hypersonic, ICBM)
- Workers Party Congress coming early 2026 - plans for nuclear program
- Trump/Lee want to revive dialogue; possible Trump-Kim meeting April 2026
- US Intel: NK "probably prepared" to test but hasn't
- Base rate: 6 tests / 225 months = 2.7%/month â†’ ~8% for 3 months
- Strong "Nothing Ever Happens" adjustment: years of readiness without action
